Uses of Class
org.apache.xalan.extensions.ExtensionNamespaceSupport

Packages that use ExtensionNamespaceSupport
org.apache.xalan.extensions Implementation of Xalan Extension Mechanism. 
 

Uses of ExtensionNamespaceSupport in org.apache.xalan.extensions
 

Methods in org.apache.xalan.extensions that return ExtensionNamespaceSupport
 ExtensionNamespaceSupport ExtensionNamespacesManager.defineJavaNamespace(java.lang.String ns)
          For any extension namespace that is not either predefined or defined by a "component" declaration or exslt function declaration, attempt to create an ExtensionNamespaceSuport object for the appropriate Java class or Java package Extension Handler.
 ExtensionNamespaceSupport ExtensionNamespacesManager.defineJavaNamespace(java.lang.String ns, java.lang.String classOrPackage)
           
 

Methods in org.apache.xalan.extensions with parameters of type ExtensionNamespaceSupport
 void ExtensionNamespacesManager.registerExtension(ExtensionNamespaceSupport extNsSpt)
          Register the extension namespace for an ElemExtensionDecl or ElemFunction, and prepare a support object to launch the appropriate ExtensionHandler at transformation runtime.
